about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in exciting next level online action! Team up and play as unique agents with different abilities and equipment. Coordinate with your allies to achieve strategic objectives, capture key positions and disrupt enemy plans. Each step and victory of your team is a new level of your personal achievements and influence on the overall outcome of the game. Your success is the success of the team!

Create your own style of play and test your skills in a competitive arena. 13 rounds of intense competition for the attacking and defending sides await you. Use all available weapons and tactics to win. Each round has one life, so stay one step ahead of your opponent if you want to survive and lead your team to victory.

Tactics and speed of decision making are your advantage.

It's more than just a shooter. Choose an agent with unique gadgets and abilities that give any player a new level of capability. Each agent is distinguished by his or her own style of play, and you won't find absolute similarities. Use the weapons and devices available in your gear to influence the result of a round, detect the enemy, outsmart them, and even destroy them.

Each map is an arena for implementing your unique tactics. This is where team strategies, exciting and decisive moments of the entire match are born. Set a style of play that will be copied for years to come.

name: METACRAFT: Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560 / Intel Arc A310
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570 / Intel Arc A380
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: METACRAFT: Arena is a competitive third-person shooter offering an interesting combination of unusual visual style and exciting gameplay. Create clans, pump up your agents and strive for the top. Test your strength in the Arena.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Belarusian, Kazakh, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
